original_text: But the same servant went out, and found one of his fellowservants, which owed him an hundred pence: and he laid hands on him, and took him by the throat, saying, Pay me that thou owest.
korean_text: 그 종이 나가서 자기에게 백 데나리온 빚진 동료 한 사람을 만나 붙들어 목을 잡고 이르되 빚을 갚으라 하매

sentences.original_text: But the same servant went out
and found one of his fellowservants
sentences.korean_translation: 자기 동료 중 한 사람을 만났습니다

sentences.original_text: which owed him an hundred pence
and he laid hands on him
and took him by the throat
